name: AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationParameters
desc: An object that specifies the amount of attenuation distance, the gradual loss in audio intensity, and other characteristics.

items.name: var distanceAttenuationModel: AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel
items.desc: The distance attenuation model that describes the drop-off in gain as the source moves away from the listener.

items.name: var maximumDistance: Float
items.desc: The distance beyond which the node applies no further attenuation, in meters.

items.name: var referenceDistance: Float
items.desc: The minimum distance at which the node applies attenuation, in meters.

items.name: var rolloffFactor: Float
items.desc: A factor that determines the attenuation curve.
